short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Harry Potter: Hogwarts Mystery extension provide you with Harry Potter: Hogwarts Mystery design on PC new tab page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Harry Potter: Hogwarts Mystery was inspired by the Wizarding World of Harry Potter created by J. K. Rowling. It’s a role-playing video game where players can create and customize their own Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry student. Like in the novel, Harry Potter: Hogwarts Mystery’s narrative is centered around learning spells, attending magic classes and going into quests. 

Extension Features:

1. Shuffle Harry Potter: Hogwarts Mystery wallpaper every time you open a new tab. 
2. Randomize background theme in settings option.
3. Get easy access to popular sites with custom web search.
4. Quick access to your emails and social media accounts.
5. Show current date and time automatically.
6. Sticky notes give you the Harry Potter: Hogwarts Mystery feels in completing real-life tasks. 
7. Get easy access to your most frequently visited websites. 
8. Get easy access to your bookmarks websites.

If you have any questions about our Harry Potter: Hogwarts Mystery wallpaper new tab extension or just want to give us some feedback, feel free to send us a message or write a review! We'd love to hear from you.
